Text: Thank you for uploading this movie.
Are there any other seeders for this? Please say yes =x

I saw this at the theater a few years back. Thanks for sharing an online version.

I recall a clever little opium smoking scene from it,  just showing the form of a traditional Chinese opium pipe as a shadow cast on the wall, and a lot of smoke curling and wafting to the ceiling, with a caption like "The Mysteries of China"!(Cocteau himself was a dedicated opium smoker for most of his life).
thank you for sharing this document with us...
